verses.verse: Moreover the word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me, <WH559> saying,

You, <WH1121> son of man, <WH120> thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh <WH3069> to the land <WH127> of Israel, <WH3478> An end: <WH7093> the end <WH7093> has come <WH935> on the four <WH702> corners <WH3671> of the land. <WH776>

Now is the end <WH7093> on you, <WH7971> and I will send my anger <WH639> on you, <WH8199> and will judge you according to your ways; <WH1870> and I will bring <WH5414> on you all your abominations. <WH8441>

My eye <WH5869> shall not spare <WH2347> you, <WH2550> neither will I have pity; but I will bring <WH5414> your ways <WH1870> on you, <WH8441> and your abominations shall be in the midst <WH8432> of you: <WH3045> and you shall know that I am Yahweh. <WH3068>
Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> An evil, <WH7451> an only <WH259> evil; <WH7451> behold, <WH935> it comes.
An end <WH7093> has come, <WH935> the end <WH7093> has come; <WH935> it awakes <WH6974> against you; <WH935> behold, it comes.

Your doom <WH6843> has come <WH935> to you, <WH3427> inhabitant of the land: <WH776> the time <WH6256> has come, <WH935> the day <WH3117> is near, <WH7138> a day of tumult, <WH4103> and not of joyful shouting, <WH1906> on the mountains. <WH2022>

Now will I shortly <WH7138> pour out <WH8210> my wrath <WH2534> on you, <WH3615> and accomplish my anger <WH639> against you, <WH8199> and will judge you according to your ways; <WH1870> and I will bring <WH5414> on you all your abominations. <WH8441>

My eye <WH5869> shall not spare, <WH2347> neither will I have pity: <WH2550> I will bring <WH5414> on you according to your ways; <WH1870> and your abominations <WH8441> shall be in the midst <WH8432> of you; <WH3045> and you shall know that I, <WH3068> Yahweh, do strike. <WH5221>
Behold, <WH3117> the day, behold, <WH935> it comes: your doom <WH6843> is gone forth; <WH3318> the rod <WH4294> has blossomed, <WH6692> pride <WH2087> has budded. <WH6524>

Violence <WH2555> has risen up <WH6965> into a rod <WH4294> of wickedness. <WH7562> None of them shall remain, <WH1995> nor of their multitude, nor of their wealth. <WH1991> There shall be nothing of value among them. <WH5089>

The time <WH6256> has come, <WH935> the day <WH3117> draws near: <WH5060> don't <WH7069> let the buyer rejoice, <WH8055> nor the seller <WH4376> mourn; <WH56> for wrath <WH2740> is on all its multitude. <WH1995>

For the seller <WH4376> shall not return <WH7725> to that which is sold, <WH4465> although they be yet alive: <WH2416> for the vision <WH2377> is touching the whole multitude <WH1995> of it, <WH7725> none shall return; neither shall any <WH376> strengthen <WH2388> himself in the iniquity <WH5771> of his life. <WH2416>
They have blown <WH8628> the trumpet, <WH8619> and have made all ready; <WH3559> but none goes <WH1980> to the battle; <WH4421> for my wrath <WH2740> is on all its multitude. <WH1995>

The sword <WH2719> is outside, <WH2351> and the pestilence <WH1698> and the famine <WH7458> within: <WH1004> he who is in the field <WH7704> shall die <WH4191> with the sword: <WH2719> and he who is in the city, <WH5892> famine <WH7458> and pestilence <WH1698> shall devour him. <WH398>

But those of those who escape <WH6403> shall escape, <WH6412> and shall be on the mountains <WH2022> like doves <WH3123> of the valleys, <WH1516> all of them moaning, <WH1993> every one <WH376> in his iniquity. <WH5771>
All hands <WH3027> shall be feeble, <WH7503> and all knees <WH1290> shall be weak <WH3212> as water. <WH4325>

They shall also clothe <WH2296> themselves with sackcloth, <WH8242> and horror <WH6427> shall cover <WH3680> them; <WH955> and shame shall be on all faces, <WH6440> and baldness <WH7144> on all their heads. <WH7218>

They shall cast <WH7993> their silver <WH3701> in the streets, <WH2351> and their gold <WH2091> shall be as an unclean <WH5079> thing; <WH3701> their silver and their gold <WH2091> shall not be able <WH3201> to deliver <WH5337> them in the day <WH3117> of the wrath <WH5678> of Yahweh: <WH3068> they shall not satisfy <WH7646> their souls, <WH5315> neither fill <WH4390> their bowels; <WH4578> because it has been the stumbling block <WH4383> of their iniquity. <WH5771>

As for the beauty <WH6643> of his ornament, <WH5716> he set <WH7760> it in majesty; <WH1347> but they made <WH6213> the images <WH6754> of their abominations <WH8441> and their detestable things <WH8251> therein: <WH5414> therefore have I made it to them as an unclean thing. <WH5079>
I will give <WH5414> it into the hands <WH3027> of the strangers <WH2114> for a prey, <WH957> and to the wicked <WH7563> of the earth <WH776> for a spoil; <WH7998> and they shall profane it. <WH2490>
My face <WH6440> will I turn <WH5437> also from them, <WH2490> and they shall profane my secret <WH6845> place; <WH6530> and robbers shall enter <WH935> into it, <WH2490> and profane it.
Make <WH6213> the chain; <WH7569> for the land <WH776> is full <WH4390> of bloody <WH1818> crimes, <WH4941> and the city <WH5892> is full <WH4390> of violence. <WH2555>

Therefore I will bring <WH935> the worst <WH7451> of the nations, <WH1471> and they shall possess <WH3423> their houses: <WH1004> I will also make the pride <WH1347> of the strong <WH5794> to cease; <WH7673> and their holy places <WH6942> shall be profaned. <WH2490>
Destruction <WH7089> comes; <WH935> and they shall seek <WH1245> peace, <WH7965> and there shall be none.

Mischief <WH1943> shall come <WH935> on mischief, <WH1943> and rumor <WH8052> shall be on rumor; <WH8052> and they shall seek <WH1245> a vision <WH2377> of the prophet; <WH5030> but the law <WH8451> shall perish <WH6> from the priest, <WH3548> and counsel <WH6098> from the elders. <WH2205>

The king <WH4428> shall mourn, <WH56> and the prince <WH5387> shall be clothed <WH3847> with desolation, <WH8077> and the hands <WH3027> of the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> shall be troubled: <WH926> I will do <WH6213> to them after their way, <WH1870> and according to their own judgments <WH4941> will I judge <WH8199> them; <WH3045> and they shall know that I am Yahweh. <WH3068>
